name: Present for Manager
description:
This game is a simulation of a classic economic Board game where player chips move across the field after throwing dice. The game can participate from two to five players. Your opponents can be both live players and computer-controlled opponents.

Back in 1989, when the Soviet Union was nearing its collapse, the Soviet entertainment industry released a magnificent Board game. This game, largely imitating its Western ancestor, has acquired the characteristics of the restructuring of the state. And as expected, sought catch up with and surpass. There is opinion, that it this managed. We present to you the" Royal battle " of our childhood. Complex, multi-faceted table economic game. Spend an unforgettable time with your loved ones who have touched upon post-Soviet masterpiece. We present you a simulator of the Board economic game "Present for Manager"!
